{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K (E9L29Y).jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Fire TV Stick 4K with all-new Alexa Voice Remote |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Amazon_Fire_TV_Stick_4K_(E9L29Y) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Amazon |model = Fire TV Stick |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 4K (E9L29Y) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media streamer, computer-on-a-stick |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AQIQ-6247 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT8695; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- ARM Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz |gpu1chip1 = IMG;GE8300; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1.5 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 5.0 LE, DFS (slave), 4K, HDR, Dolby Atmos, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/3/2018 |estreldate = 10/31/2018 |estprice = 50 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B079QHML21 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |multirev = Yes |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7668; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{FCC ST|04/01/2019|indexme.}}
===Specifications=== :[https://developer.amazon.com/docs/fire-tv/device-specifications.html?v=ftvstick4kgen1 Device Specifications] *System on Chip (SoC) Platform: :[[MediaTek]] MT8695 + MT7668 *CPU: Quad Core ARM CPU @1.7GHz *GPU: IMG GE8300; Bluetooth: BT 5.0 LE *Storage: 8GB (internal); Memory: 1.5GB (DDR4) *Networking: 2.4/5GHz 802.11abgn/ac (2x2 MU-MIMO) *Ports: HDMI output, Micro USB 2.0 for power only *Device OS/Platform software: :Fire OS 6 - Based on Android 7.1 (API Level 25) *Screen resolution (px) and Refresh rate (Hz): :HEVC/AVC/VP9 4K UHD up to 60 fps *HDCP: 2.2; Density (dp): 640 (2160p), 320 (1080p), 213 (720p) *Density Identifier: xxxhdpi (2160p), xhdpi (1080p), tvdpi (720p) *I/O Color Formats: HLG, Dolby Vision, and HDR10+ :Optional 10/100 Ethernet adapter
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.aftvnews.com/amazon-announces-fire-tv-stick-4k-with-new-alexa-voice-remote-equipment-control-capabilities-dolby-vision-dolby-atmos-and-hdr10/ ''Amazon announces Fire TV Stick 4K '' on '''AFTVnews'''] *[http://www.aftvnews.com/ðŸ“Œ-amazon-announces-new-alexa-voice-remote-with-universal-remote-capabilities-that-is-backward-compatible-with-older-fire-tvs-and-fire-tv-sticks/ ''Amazon announces new Alexa Voice Remote '' on '''AFTVnews''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
